column5: The digital transformation of business including the emergence of new digital business models have become crucial issues for leaders in the vast majority of organisations. The MSc Entrepreneurship gives you the necessary expertise vital for organisations to be able to navigate the challenges in this era of digital business.This Master's degree provides a specialist offering in entrepreneurship and you will gain a comprehensive understanding of a range of issues including:
